alert.note: Alert for Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 4:35AM CDT until May 24 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL HIDALGO COUNTY... At 435 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Josefa Garcia Park, or near Palmhurst, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Edinburg, Mission, Elsa, Palmview, Edcouch, Palmhurst, North McAllen, Hargill, Sharyland and Faysville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
